arts.ttl: Watford need more reliable performers and less mavericks says Cleverley
arts.sum: Tom Cleverley said after the defeat to Preston that there is 'no future' in a team that can play at two extremes in the space of a few days.
How the game unfolded at Vicarage Road as Watford suffered another home defeat as Preston did the double over them.

arts.ttl: Milutin Osmajic fires Preston to victory at Watford
arts.sum: The striker’s brace sealed the points despite Rocco Vata’s late reply.

arts.ttl: Watford in picture to sign player ‘on the way out’ – Pozzo family involvement needed in this operation
arts.sum: Como goalkeeper Emil Audero has ended up on Watford’s agenda for the winter market. The 28-year-old has failed to keep a clean sheet and conceded 18 goals from eight league games this season. He’s made one appearance in the past two months as Como manager Cesc Fàbregas dropped him to the bench. arts.ttl: Watford ‘seriously interested’ in Euro 2024 centre-forward – Offer would be listened to
arts.sum: According to a claim in the Turkish media, Watford are ‘seriously interested’ in signing Trabzonspor centre-forward Denis Dragus in this transfer window. The Championship side will be looking to add to their squad as they chase promotion to the Premier League.
